entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [WinUI] CollectionView virtualization broken when not using templated columns #18967
    Backlog
  • [Maui Blazor] Input overlapped by keyboard #18964
  • [tests] Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #18961
    .NET 8 SR2
  • The visual state "Pressed" is not reset to "Normal" when navigate and go back in Windows. #18958
  • Maui - Moved to net 8 - creating MSIX is not working #18957
  • [iOS] AbsoluteLayout not rendering child elements #18956
    Backlog
  • RefreshView, causing TapGestureRecognizer and button command not working on iOS and Android #18955
  • [Windows] `PlatformImage.FromStream` crash #18954
  • Shell.NavBarIsVisible is not working on iOS #18948
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Icons in the Shell TitleView and Shell Toolbar items not displayed in iOS #18946

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.0] [iOS] - Page of (first) FlyoutItem not loading when FlyoutHeader is available #17432
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.2.9530] Completely broken virtualization in CollectionView #18639
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [regression/7.0.0] [Android] Entry return type not rendering properly #17463
    .NET 8 GA
  • CollectionView items height is all over the place when scrolling on iOS (.Net 8 + MAUI workload 8.0.0-rc.1.9171/8.0.100-rc.1) #17890
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Wrong button width when using ImageSource #18924
  • Unable to deploy to iphone from VS 2022 #18947
  • CommunityToolkit.Maui. popup crashes on iOS only #18952
  • GitHub Actions no longer builds MAUI (Android): Java SDK 11.0 or above is required when using .NET 6 or higher #18906
  • keyboard problem #18939
  • Fix the Color validation tests that use shadows #13692
    Backlog
  • When create and running a new .net MAUI Blazor Hybrid App only show the blue background #18707
  • [Testing] Failing tests on iOS 14.5 - webView:decidePolicyForNavigationAction:decisionHandler:] was not called #18749
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Publish IOS App Error ZipArchive.framework/ZipArchive' contains bitcode. #18920
  • TableView blows up on iOS/Catalyst when using SceneDelegate #13948
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI Workload installed But the option to choose MAUI doesn't show up on the third dropdown. #18926
  • MAUI Conversion From XF App does not read App.xml at all #11039
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Update GitInfo.txt to 8.0.4 for nightlies #18963
  • [tests] Add runs on iOS17 #18962
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 SR1
  • Also setcornerradius if radius is 0. It didn't go into this block and… #18959
    community ✨
  • [Blazor] Fix static file handling so that it special cases modules.json (main) #18953
  • [Blazor] Fix static file handling so that it special cases modules.json (7.0) #18950
  • Update ShellSectionRenderer.cs #18945
    community ✨
  • Bump Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset from 4.7.0 to 4.8.0 #18944
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the androidx group with 16 updates #18943
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18942
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the xunit group with 3 updates #18941
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • [Windows] Address CollectionView virtualization #18813
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, i/regression
  • Prevent iOS CollectionView size shifts from clearing the cell size cache #18464
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [tests] Ignore flaky android device tests #18905
    area/testing, testing-flakiness
  • [iOS] Make sure always call decisionHandler even if no handler #18934
    area/testing, testing-flakiness

Updated

  • [WinUI] Fix resizing CV rows when content size changed #18932
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Process the hardware enter key as "Done" #16386
    area/controls 🎮, Under Consideration
  • Allow GesturePlatformManager to be created for views with null window… #18938
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix margin on title bar #17729
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 SR1
  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1
  • Move the device test for ShowsKeyboardOnFocus to Appium #18747
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, area/keyboard
  • [Android] Fix Enter key triggering ReturnCommand on Entry #18560
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Testing] Add CollectionView UITests #18798
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing
  • ScrollView content needs layout when ScrollView.InvalidateMeasure is called #17639
    area/layout 🔲, partner/hot-reload-xaml, .NET 8 SR1
  • Disconnect property changes from all pages when TabbedPage set to null #18458
    area/TabbedPage, community ✨
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test E1 #18624
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D13 #18710
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Add Layout UITests #18923
    area/layout 🔲, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Fixes BindableLayout BindingContext inheritance #17290
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, stale, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 SR1
  • Improves performance on BindableProperty #17756
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.1.4 to 4.3.1 #18592
    do-not-merge, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • iOS/Mac Catalyst 17+ Support for new Calendar Permissions #18868
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.5.0 to 4.7.0 #16888
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, stale, Under Consideration
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18606
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Add HttpClient factory for UriImageSource #10995
    area/image :framed_picture:, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fix menu item command binding (#13848) #14345
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, control-menubar, stale, Under Consideration
